title: Enchanting Navratna Kundan Haaram with Basra Pearl Drops
materials: Emeralds. Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine and antique appeal.
features: A mesmerizing Kundan Haaram, meticulously handcrafted in a traditional Telugu design. The centerpiece features a Navratna arrangement with a central Ruby, flanked by Emeralds, all set within intricate Kundan settings. Delicate floral motifs adorn the necklace, interspersed with Basra Pearl drops for a touch of timeless elegance. The graceful pendant clusters enhance the neckline, adding to its regal charm.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. This Haaram adds a touch of traditional splendor to any bridal ensemble or festive attire.
description: A timeless heirloom piece showcasing the exquisite craftsmanship of Hyderabadi artisans. The combination of Kundan stones, Navratnas, and Basra pearls exudes opulence and cultural significance. This Haaram represents a perfect blend of tradition and elegance, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. It also symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it an ideal gift for loved ones.
